introduce.title: What is ShipAny
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: ShipAny is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups, including templates, components, and documentation.

items.title: Ready-to-use Templates
items.description: Choose from dozens of production-ready AI SaaS templates to quickly start your project.

items.title: Infrastructure Setup
items.description: Get instant access to scalable infrastructure with best practices built-in.

items.title: Quick Deployment
items.description: Deploy your AI SaaS application to production in hours, not days.

items.title: AI Integration
items.description: Integrate AI into your project with ease using our built-in AI SDK.

benefits.title: Why Choose ShipAny
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Get everything you need to launch your AI startup - from ready-to-use templates to technical support.

items.title: Complete Framework
items.description: Built on Next.js with authentication, payments, and AI integration - everything works out of the box.

items.title: Rich Templates Library
items.description: Choose from various AI SaaS templates to kickstart your project - chatbots, image generation, and more.

items.title: Technical Guidance
items.description: Get dedicated support and join our developer community to ensure your successful launch.

items.title: Customize Your Project

items.title: Deploy to Production
items.description: Deploy your project to production with a few steps and start serving customers immediately.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About ShipAny
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: What exactly is ShipAny and how does it work?
items.answer: ShipAny is a comprehensive NextJS boilerplate designed specifically for building AI SaaS startups. It provides ready-to-use templates, infrastructure setup, and deployment tools that help you launch your AI business in hours instead of days.

items.question: Do I need advanced technical skills to use ShipAny?
items.answer: While basic programming knowledge is helpful, ShipAny is designed to be developer-friendly. Our templates and documentation make it easy to get started, even if you're not an expert in AI or cloud infrastructure.

items.question: What types of AI SaaS can I build with ShipAny?
items.answer: ShipAny supports a wide range of AI applications, from content generation to data analysis tools. Our templates cover popular use cases like AI chatbots, content generators, image processing apps, and more.

items.question: How long does it typically take to launch with ShipAny?
items.answer: With ShipAny, you can have a working prototype in hours and a production-ready application in hours. Our one-click deployment and pre-configured infrastructure significantly reduce the traditional months-long development cycle.

items.question: What's included in the ShipAny infrastructure?
items.answer: ShipAny provides a complete infrastructure stack including authentication, database setup, API integration, payment processing, and scalable cloud deployment. Everything is pre-configured following industry best practices.

items.question: Can I customize the templates to match my brand?
items.answer: Absolutely! All ShipAny templates are fully customizable. You can modify the design, features, and functionality to match your brand identity and specific business requirements while maintaining the robust underlying infrastructure.

cta.title: Ship your first AI SaaS Startup
